page.title: 13MOVING OUT OF HIGH HAM AREA
page.content: The village shop does not stock anything in quantity, hence it is used for emergency items only. Most people within the block go to nearby towns to shop,or use the mobile shops. We asked 100 people about their shopping habits. Most people travel weekly to Langport (5km), Street (11km), and Somerton (9km) for fresh food. Monthly visits are made to Yeovil (25km), Bridgwater (16km), and Taunton (25km). Food can be bought in bulk in these larger towns, and there is a wider variety of goods on offer. People also travel to these places for entertainment and sports facilities. The only recreation facilities within the block are 2 public houses. "The King's Head Inn" at High Ham, which sells only drink, and "The Pound" at Aller where meals as well as drink are served.
